definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To impale on a spit ; to pierce with a sharp object .
examples: to spit a loin of veal

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To use a spit to cook ; to attend to food that is cooking on a spit.
examples: She’s spitting the roast in the kitchen.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To impale on a spit ; to pierce with a sharp object .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To use a spit to cook ; to attend to food that is cooking on a spit.

definitions.definition: ( ambitransitive ) To evacuate ( saliva or another substance) from the mouth , etc.
( ambitransitive ) To emit or expel in a manner similar to evacuating saliva from the mouth.
examples: a hot pan spitting droplets of fat

definitions.definition: ( impersonal ) To rain or snow slightly .
( intransitive ) To make a spitting sound , like an angry cat .
( transitive , slang , hip-hop ) To rap , to utter.
( intransitive , slang , humorous ) (in the form spitting) To spit facts ; to tell the truth .

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To evacuate ( saliva or another substance) from the mouth , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( ambitransitive ) To emit or expel in a manner similar to evacuating saliva from the mouth.
( impersonal ) To rain or snow slightly .
( intransitive ) To make a spitting sound , like an angry cat .
( transitive , slang , hip-hop ) To rap , to utter.
( intransitive , slang , humorous ) (in the form spitting) To spit facts ; to tell the truth .

definitions.definition: To dig (something) using a spade ; also, to turn (the soil ) using a plough .

main_definition: ( transitive , dialectal ) To dig (something) using a spade ; also, to turn (the soil ) using a plough .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , dialectal ) To plant (something) using a spade.
( intransitive , dialectal ) To dig, to spade .
